crust.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: the hard brown outer surface of bread
crust.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: sandwiches with the crusts cut off
crust.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: the baked outer part of foods such as pies or pizzas
crust.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a thin hard dry layer on the surface of something
crust.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: A hard gray crust had formed on the bottom of the tea kettle.
crust.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: the hard outer layer of the Earth
